section.title: Deployment Fails With MSDOS Disks Labels Do Not Support Partition Names
section.para: If a disk drive allocated to Swift uses the MBR partition table type, the deploy process refuses to label and format the drive. This is to prevent potential data loss. (For more information, see . If you intend to use the disk drive for Swift, you must convert the MBR partition table to GPT on the drive using /sbin/sgdisk.

note.para: This process only applies to Swift drives. It does not apply to the operating system or boot drive.
